topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc19356368720e084e0000#post_52fc19356368720e084e0000

Oh no, you're totally not racist. Some of your best friends are black or immigrants I'm sure. Anyone who would accuse you of such a thing is ridiculous. I don't know why anyone would ever arrive at the notion.

"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc17f063687247f5660000#post_52fc17f063687247f5660000
Stupid question time:
If you had your way then what would happen to people like me who are of mixed ethnic origins?  In other words lets a illegal immigrant has a child with a native european, what would you do with the child?  Where would you put us "mutts"?  Yes that is the racial slur against people of different ethnic origins and I have been called a mutt before.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc1a9c6368720bf4890000#post_52fc1a9c6368720bf4890000
I'm not going to do anything to you. However the tide of new arrivals has to stop or the demographic shifts are going to be irreversible.

The fact is that the labor parties of Europe brought in these immigrants because the immigrants would vote for them. So they stole political power in the democratic system from their actual constituents for their own benefit.

"@Background Pony":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc19a46368721694c40200#post_52fc19a46368721694c40200
>hurr you're racist for being critical of politically motivated immigration
we're done here
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc1bbb6368720e29f70000#post_52fc1bbb6368720e29f70000

Oh no! We're done here? How else will I get to here about the purity of a race or culture being maintained in the face of the "coloured tide?"

Do you at least have a newsletter I can subscribe to to keep informed? I checked out stormfront but they didn't have your articles yet.

"@Background Pony":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc1c546368720c15270100#post_52fc1c546368720c15270100
You are obviously unaware of the present demographic shifts. You are unaware of the political nature of these changes. And I said nothing of 'racial purity' (as evidenced by my statements 'no one is against any immigrants' and complimenting the Sikhs and Christian Arabs)
Which is why you're engaging in fallacious strawmanning, buzzwords, guilt by association (hurr nazis thought this too according to my High School History class) among others.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc1dac636872470d2a0100#post_52fc1dac636872470d2a0100

Keep talking man. I'm sure the more you type this the smarter you'll seem to people. You are definitely proving the assertions against you quite wrong. Why, by the time this is over you'll be given a triumphant position in the board of multiculturalism.

After all, you mentioned a token example in passing and seem to come to the conclusion that immigration is more about numbers and demographics than it is about race or culture. So, bearing that in mind, it's quite obvious that the best way to preserve a culture is to maintain it's demographics. That will never, EVER be a racial distinctions. In fact, I'm sure those who are against immigration are practically color blind.

"@Background Pony":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc1f5463687246e8950100#post_52fc1f5463687246e8950100
You're using logical fallacies called Appealing to Consequences and Slippery Slope.
The Slippery Slope is that "No more Mass Immigration will lead to racial discrimination, always" and the Appeal to Consequences says that "because this consequence could happen and is undesirable, then your statements are automatically wrong" which is not an appropriate burden of proof.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
For anyone else. Copied from a message sent to uc9.

It goes without saying that I do not advocate anything he said I did (as he said it without proof)and my concerns are not that "brown people be inferior" but simply that Europe’s native population is susceptible to replacement due to low birth rates and the political motivations behind mass immigration.

As I said, I hold no such opinions about America since it is not a native White country, in fact I would be willing to cede territory to Native Americans since we did relocate them.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc202c6368723660560000#post_52fc202c6368723660560000

_Appeal to Consequences says that "because this consequence could happen and is undesirable, then your statements are automatically wrong" which is not an appropriate burden of proof. Appeal to Consequences says that "because this consequence could happen and is undesirable, then your statements are automatically wrong" which is not an appropriate burden of proof._ 

So, explain how immigration is bad without using such an appeal yourself.

Or better yet, don't use cellophane rhetoric to construct your cause. It's pretty clear to anyone reading your words you are xenophobic at best and almost certainly racist. I do implore you to keep going though. Anyone who can read between the lines of your ever shrinking argument can easily infer where you stand.

"But, but- I'm not racist! I'm not like that at all. Umm- Slippery slope. I'm just saying all of the *other kinds* should keep out to retain the purity of our nation and identity. I mean, there's nothing hostile or racist about that at all. Cultures have to be preserved by keeping others out of it and drawing very clear, distinct cultural lines. That's totally not hatred guys. It is preservation."

Everyone can see through you.
I don't think there's anything wrong with trying to preserve one's culture. That's just my two scents.
topics.author: 5037a9f87f123b3532002e58

topics.body:
"@Background Pony":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/52fc22486368726c5a6b0000#post_52fc22486368726c5a6b0000
>explain how immigration is bad
I'm not anti-immigration. I'm anti mass european immigration because it was done simply for political reasons. Tony Blair's old speechwriter admitted this.

>anyone who can read between the lines
Funny how I said in any earlier post "the person I'm arguing with has to resort to making shit up"

>"But, but- I’m not racist! I’m not like that at all.
Trying to characterize me as a blubbering twit

>hurr racial purity
never said that.
I've even said things that go against that.

>Cultures have to be preserved by keeping others out of it and drawing very clear, distinct cultural lines.
No they don't. Again, never said that. I said to stop the mass immigration because too many are coming in with too high a birth rate.

Which will mean more non native kids, eventually making the natives a minority.
And in a democratic system this will also mean the natives, as a group, will have less political power in their own countries.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body: As much as I support multiculturalism. I think there also must be a way to help preserve and assert native cultures and ideas in their own nations.
